SELECT ci.id, ci.user_id AS userId, ci.post_id AS postId, ci.create_date AS createDate, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.pageviews, tu.USERNAME AS username, tu.AVATAR AS avatar FROM collect_info ci LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( pi.id = ci.post_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ci.user_id ) WHERE ci.delete_flag = 0
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.title},'%')
AND tu.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo.username},'%')
AND ci.user_id = #{collectInfo.userId}
ORDER BY ci.create_date DESC
